title: Jovica Veljovic at the SF Public Library!
content:
Will you be going to see Jovica Veljovic at the SF Public Library? I will be!

If you don’t already know, Jovica is a famous Calligrapher and Type Designer.

“A slide lecture by Jovica Veljovic, calligrapher, printmaker, teacher and word-renowned type designer, from Hamburg, Germany. Cosponsored by the Book Arts and Special Collections Center.”

August 28th

5:30 reception  
6:30-7:30 presentation.  
( Lower level, Koret Auditorium )

For more info: contact Susie Taylor at The SFPL rare book room.

(415) 557-4560

More info about the great resource that is the SFPL rare book room  
 [http://sfpl.org/librarylocations/main/bookarts/bookarts.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122001316/http:/sfpl.org/librarylocations/main/bookarts/bookarts.htm "http://sfpl.org/librarylocations/main/bookarts/bookarts.htm")  
 [http://sfpl.lib.ca.us/librarylocations/main/bookarts/prestianni.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122001316/http:/sfpl.lib.ca.us/librarylocations/main/bookarts/prestianni.htm "http://sfpl.lib.ca.us/librarylocations/main/bookarts/prestianni.htm")  
 [http://www.linotype.com/769/jovicaveljovic.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122001316/http:/www.linotype.com/769/jovicaveljovic.html "http://www.linotype.com/769/jovicaveljovic.html")  
 [http://www.atypi.org/05\_About\_us/75\_Prix\_Charles\_Peignot/#veljovic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122001316/http:/www.atypi.org/05_About_us/75_Prix_Charles_Peignot/#veljovic "http://www.atypi.org/05\_About\_us/75\_Prix\_Charles\_Peignot/#veljovic")  
 [http://cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/atypi2004-prague/537-medium.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122001316/http:/cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/atypi2004-prague/537-medium.jpg "http://cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/atypi2004-prague/537-medium.jpg")

I didn’t include the links or the phone # in my 1st post ( my blog ) so here it is again. Hopefully more people will see it this time!

 [‹ I am stunned!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122001316/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47921 "Go to previous forum topic") [The Typecon 2008 thanks thread ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122001316/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47621 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Eben Sorkin

comments.content: This sounds good. I’ll go. Veljovic isn’t very public or visible lately, though he’s still making type. I remember that one image from ATypI of his new work.
